title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #110
body:
## Date and Time

June 06, 2023 at **14:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Cancun](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md) & [Deneb](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0) upgrade

-   EIP-4844 Implementers call 22 [Recording](https://youtu.be/IckYm8ZXZtE) & [Readiness checklist](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/4844-readiness-checklist.md)
  - Changes included in the Network Upgrade.
    - [EIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153)
    - [EIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844)
    - [EIP-6475: SSZ Optional](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6475)
    - [EIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780)
  - EIPs Considered for Inclusion
    - [EIP-2537: Precompile for BLS12-381 curve operations](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2537)
    - [EIP-4788: Beacon block root in the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788)
    - [EIP-6493: SSZ Transaction Signature Scheme](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493)

#### Useful resources
- [PEEPanEIP-1153 with Moody Salem](https://youtu.be/9YMEYTzzKtI)
- [PEEPanEIP-4844 with Terence & Kasey](https://youtu.be/4lyb02wZQQ4)
- [Curated Deneb updates](https://etherworld.co/2023/04/29/ethereum-dencun-upgrade/)

#### Moved to Prague
  - EOF Devnets Implementers Meeting [Recording 14](https://youtu.be/lJGlVRZIYUY) Notes [14](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1w_yoxm0O-RwX7cguBRSjMYs5qv40uYoh3961MNS1sEg/edit#) 

### 2. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [ETHPrague hackathon](https://ethprague.com/ ) June 9-11, 2023
- [DeFi Summit](https://praguedefisummit.com/)
- [Devconnect - Istanbul](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/04/20/announcing-devconnect-ist) - November 13-19, 2023.
### 3. General updates/discussion
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6563 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 1910 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3063 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 286 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - ECH Website 
    - A page for [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun)
    - Opensource projects list
- ECH Operations 
   - ERC-4337 Telegram integration
   - Splitting the ECH meeting video to create a general community update video and share it with the community
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 162]()
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 110]()
  - EIPIP [meeting 81]()
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 17 [Recording]() & Meeting 18 [Agenda]()

### 4. New initiative/association
- Update ECH access
  - Discord, Twitter, Medium
  - Contributors to send weekly Tweets or repost on social media to increase reach
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [109]()

#### The date for the next meeting is June 20, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)

I have continually documented in the (currently closed) [EIP-6269](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269) why it is relevant to reconsider this, and numerous people have also shown support, e.g. on Twitter (I have linked some of them) & @xinbenlv also can see my arguments why it is important (see his comments [here](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269#issuecomment-1497701923)). I kindly ask you to reconsider your decision as I really think it is wrong to close this important, definitional EIP.

> I have continually documented in the (currently closed) [EIP-6269](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269) why it is relevant to reconsider this, and numerous people have also shown support, e.g. on Twitter (I have linked some of them) & @xinbenlv also can see my arguments why it is important (see his comments [here](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269#issuecomment-1497701923)). I kindly ask you to reconsider your decision as I really think it is wrong to close this important, definitional EIP. 

Yes, given the context of zkEVM, I think it's worthy to reopen this discussion about defining what's considered "EVM compliance"

Also we shall discuss it to be whether an informational or meta EIP?
